SSG_Tools.SSG_Nodes.Util
Class HitRecord

java.lang.Object
  SSG_Tools.SSG_Nodes.Util.HitRecord

public class HitRecord
extends java.lang.Object

This class contains the information returned by the OpenGL selection operation, such as the min and max depth and the list of "names" on the OpenGL name stack.

Constructor Summary
HitRecord(int[] buffer, int start)
          Construct a HitRecord by extracting the hit information from the specified buffer returned by OpenGL.
 
Method Summary
 int getMax()
          Get the maximum depth value for this hit.
 int getMin()
          Get the minimum depth value for this hit.
 int[] getNames()
          Get the array of names for this hit.
 int lastName()
          Get the last name on the list of names for this hit.
 int numNames()
          Get the number of names for this hit.
 java.lang.String toString()
          Convert the information in this HitRecord to a String form for debugging purposes.
 
Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object
equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait
 

Constructor Detail

HitRecord

public HitRecord(int[] buffer,
                 int start)
Construct a HitRecord by extracting the hit information from the specified buffer returned by OpenGL.

Parameters:
buffer - An array containing the selection information as a sequence of integers in the sequence returned by the OpenGL selection mechanism.
start - The index into the buffer where the current hit record information starts.

Get the number of names for this hit.

Returns:
the number of names for this hit.

public int lastName()
Get the last name on the list of names for this hit.

Returns:
The top name on the name stack for this hit.

public int[] getNames()
Get the array of names for this hit.

Get the minimum depth value for this hit.

toString

public java.lang.String toString()
Convert the information in this HitRecord to a String form for debugging purposes.

Overrides:
toString in class java.lang.Object
Returns:
A multi-line string containing the number of names, min and max distance and the list of names for this hit record.
